Articles.Content:
Just for Laughs a division of SMSE presents the Kerbal Silver and Golden Surfer, both parts are self contained and require no plugins, compatible with latest KSP versions.

Both items are configured as probes and should be considered RTF (requires no further additions or fuel) As these items are intended as just for fun they contain perpetual fuel generators and are completely self sustaining.

Both items can be used without crew although the Golden surfer does contain a basic internal so that you can have a first person view of atmospheric surfing. The boards themselves are configured as wings and provide lift and a long extended glide capacity, extremely easy to fly, full throttle extended use will result in explosions, full throttle is never needed however.

DOWNLOAD from DropBox

The mod is supplied as "as is" and no warranties or guarantees are implied or offered also under the do what you want with it license, dae file available on request to interested modders.

Very average modelling by me, cop out texture also by me enjoy
